actions.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee of Members of the House to attend the memorial service for the crew members of the Challenger shuttle mission.

summary.text: Provides for a delegation of Members of the House of Representatives to attend the memorial service for crew members of the Challenger shuttle mission in Houston, Texas, on January 31, 1986.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee of Members of the House to attend the memorial service for the crew members of the Challenger shuttle mission.
